title: Senior Director, Head of Enterprise IT
description:
We are currently seeking a dynamic and experienced individual to join our team as the Head of Enterprise IT, reporting directly to our Group CIO. In this role, you will be responsible for leading the development and implementation of IT solutions across Finance & HR, Common Systems, Access & Collaboration, and User Services. Your leadership will be pivotal in enhancing business processes and ensuring seamless service delivery while aligning technology initiatives with our strategic goals.
   

  

 As the Head of Enterprise IT, you will oversee the entire lifecycle of technology solutions, from concept through deployment to ongoing optimization. Collaborating with various stakeholders, including our CFO, CPO, and CHRO, you will ensure that our IT solutions effectively meet business needs and drive excellence. Your expertise will be crucial in fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement within the organization.
   

  

**Why should you join us?**
 GlobalConnect is a leading provider of digital solutions in the Nordics, committed to innovation and customer satisfaction. Joining our team means working with some of the brightest minds in the industry and being part of a company that is at the forefront of digital transformation. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, along with a dynamic and inclusive work environment that values diversity and collaboration.
   

  

**Requirements:**
* Proven experience (10+ years) in a leadership role within IT and/or Telecom.
* In-depth understanding of IT systems, processes, and technologies, with a successful track record of solution delivery.
* Strong leadership skills with the ability to inspire teams and foster a collaborative, high-performance environment.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, enabling effective interaction with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (relevant certifications are a plus).
* Location in Stockholm, Oslo, or Copenhagen is preferred.


 If you are a strategic thinker with a problem-solving mindset and a passion for driving technological innovation, we would love to hear from you. Join us in shaping the future of our IT solutions and making a meaningful impact on our business and customers.

title: Network Architect
company_industry: Computer and Network Security and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Engagement Type:** 
 Contract
 



**Location:** 
 Sweden (precise location to be confirmed) – primarily on-site
 



**Security Clearance:** 
 Likely required due to compliance with the Swedish Secrecy Act
 



**Residency Requirement:** 
 Must be either a resident of Sweden or reside close enough to travel on-site as needed
 



**Rate:** 
 Open, with flexibility for an all-inclusive rate or rate plus expenses
 



 Overview
 



 Our client require a specialized architect to support a complex build-out of NES (Network Edge Services) applications and Operational Technology (OT) network infrastructure, with an emphasis on secure and optimized Linux-based environments. This role demands advanced expertise in
 **Kubernetes** 
 ,
 **OpenShift** 
 , and
 **Linux infrastructure** 
 , as well as the ability to design and architect environments that integrate effectively with the factory’s Industrial Internet of Things (IIOT) systems.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* **OT Network Infrastructure Development:** 
 Architect and implement the OT network, including integration of new IIOT infrastructure to support factory operations. This is separate from traditional IT networks and will involve specific OT principles and security considerations.
* **System Architecture & Design:** 
 Design architecture for Linux, Kubernetes, and OpenShift environments, developing frameworks, guardrails, and integration principles that ensure operational efficiency and compliance.
* **Testing and Production Environments:** 
 Architect and oversee deployments in both test and production environments, with a view towards scalability, security, and alignment with the wider factory infrastructure.
* **Collaboration & Integration:** 
 Work closely with both local and remote teams (including US-based Linux teams) to bridge gaps in expertise, particularly around OpenShift and Kubernetes management within OT environments.
* **Security & Compliance:** 
 Implement and maintain necessary security protocols in compliance with the Swedish Secrecy Act, ensuring secure OT network operations.
* **Operational Support Transition:** 
 Develop operational documentation, standards, and training to transition ownership to local teams post-deployment.



  





**Required Skills and Experience** 



* **Subject Matter Expertise:** 
 In-depth expertise in Kubernetes, OpenShift, and Linux infrastructure with the ability to build, manage, and troubleshoot in complex OT network environments.
* **Architecture & Design Experience:** 
 Proven ability to design secure, scalable infrastructure with a comprehensive understanding of OT principles, security guardrails, and integration needs for IIOT environments.
* **Hands-On Build Experience:** 
 Ability to perform hands-on build tasks while maintaining an architect’s perspective on how this technology integrates with and supports larger factory operations.
* **Collaborative and Adaptive Approach:** 
 Comfortable working with global teams, particularly remote Linux teams in the US, and able to provide guidance on OpenShift and Kubernetes.
* **Compliance Awareness:** 
 Experience with high-security environments and familiarity with legal or compliance considerations in an industrial context.

title: Cloud Consultant
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Business Consulting and Services, and IT System Design Services
description:
***Senior Cloud Architect - Azure***




***Leading Nordic IT Consultancy Company - Sweden***




  





 Would you like the opportunity to join Sweden's fastest-growing IT organizations in the Nordics, renowned for delivering secure and cutting-edge Cloud solutions to high-profile enterprises and public entities.
 



  





 In the last 3 years they have grown their market leading business to over 500 colleagues, with significant growth and investment occurring in their cloud division.
 



  





 You will be responsible for architecting and programme managing significant multi-tenant cloud solutions for some of the most prestigious companies in Sweden. In the first instance, you will be the lead, working with two significant clients who are in the early stages of a significant cloud transformation.
 



  





**Requirements:** 




  




* 5+ years of designing public or hybrid cloud solutions.
* Fluent proficiency in Swedish (spoken and written).
* Good experience of working on or managing significant cloud migrations.



  





  





 My client offers a flexible hybrid position, recognition and rewards programs, plus a highly competitive salary.
 



  





*Thank you for your interest in this opportunity. If your application is successful, we will contact you to discuss the position in more detail within 48 hours of receiving your CV. Please assume your application has been unsuccessful if you do not hear back from us within 48 hours.*

title: ERP Consultant
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Technology, Information and Media
description:
Presales Consultant / Presales Engineer / Sales Engineer / Technical Sales / Solution Consultant / Solution Engineer / SAP Consultant / ERP Consultant / SAP FI Consultant - SAP S4/HANA (Finance & Accounting)
 



  





**We are looking for a Nordic speaker SAP or ERP consultant who is open for relocating to sunny Barcelona!** 




  





**Barcelona = sunny skies, beach days, and a vibrant lifestyle, all with a much lower cost of living.** 
 You’ll also join their dynamic young professional community. With 250+ colleagues organizing meetups and group outings, you’ll never be short of things to do!
 



  





 Our client is one of the world's largest enterprise software vendor and a partner for SAP ERP solutions with over 100,000 employees, 150+ global offices and $30 billion revenue.
 



  





 They are looking for a Nordics speaking SAP S4 HANA solution consultant to join their digital hub in Barcelona, focused on fast growing mid market clients across different domains:
 



  





 You will act as domain expert and work on solution lifecycle from presales, demonstrating product value, client presentation, analysing requirements, advising on product features/modules, migration, integrations, etc.
 



  





 Experience:
 



 -2 years + working as presales or sales engineer or solution engineer or solution consultant or implementation consultant or finance/accounting consulting
 



 -Experience in any ERP or SAP solutions or Accounting software or Financial software, (such as SAP S4 or SAP ECC or Dynamics Finance/F&O, Infor, Oracle, Sage, Workday, Netsuite, IFS, Xero, etc. is a big plus)
 



 -Knowledge in finance or accounting or procurement
 



**-Must speak one of the Nordic languages** 




**-Willing to relocate to Barcelona** 




  





 Full time permanent role and offer:
 



 -Hybrid & flexible working/3 days per week on site in Barcelona
 



 -75k to 95k Euro OTE (80% base + 20% bonus with flexibility + full benefits)
 



 -Relocation scheme

title: Research assistant (time-limited position)
description:
**at Molecular biosciences, Wenner-Grens institute.
 **Closing date: 4 December 2024.****
 The Department of Molecular Biosciences, Wenner-Gren Institute (MBW) conducts experimental basic research in molecular cell biology, intergrative biology and infection and immune biology. The research environment is characterized by a modern and advanced methodology and has a strong international profile. MBW is one of the larger departments of the Faculty of Science at Stockholm University with more than 30 research groups and about 180 employees, of whom about 60 are doctoral students. Read more about MBW at www.su.se/mbw
   

  

**Main Responsibilities**
 The work involves molecular biology experiments to study epigenetics with Western blot, PCR, molecualr cloning, cell culture experiments and with in situ hybridization.
   

  

**Qualification Requirements**
 We are looking for someone with experience from these techniques and that has a Master’s degree in the biological sciences.
   

  

**Terms of employment**
 This is a full-time, time limited position of 6 months with the possibilty of extension. Start date 2025-03-01 or per agreement.
   

  

 Stockholm University strives to be a workplace free from discrimination and with equal opportunities for all.
   

  

**Contact**
 Further information about the position can be obtained from Professor Mattias Mannervik, telephone: +46 8 16 15 65, mattias.mannervik@su.se.
   

  

**Union representatives**

title: Machine Learning Engineer Senior - Stockholm (hybrid remote)
description:
Boost IT is a Portuguese technology consultancy company, we are integrated into one of the most entrepreneurial groups in Portugal, with investment in more than 30 companies.
  
  

We want to be known for being the most dynamic, energetic and reliable company to operate in the market and, for that, we want to count on you.
  
  

If you're passionate about technology and want to work on the most relevant technology projects, then this ad could be for you!
  
  

Boost IT. Doing IT. Better
  
  

Tasks
  
  

* Position: Machine Learning Engineer
* International Project – Stockholm
* 2x per week in the office – Stockholm
* Project in the Retail sector


Requirements
  
  

**GCP requirements:**  

* Familiar with BigQuery, can code SQL
* Familiar with Cloud composer / airflow
* Familiar with IAM, service account
* Familiar with Data catalog
* Understand Infrastructure as Code
* Good to have knowledge with Dataflow, K8s, Vertex AI pipeline, Kubeflow pipeline


**Cloud diagnostic skills:**  

* Deep knowledge about python programing, practice OOP, following coding best practice, know how to use flake8, mypy, black, SonarQube and pre-commit
* Deep knowledge in unit test and end to end test, familiar with Pytest, fixtures, unittest etc


**Unix:**  

* Familiar with popular Unix system, know how to install sth in docker.
* Familiar with shell


**Git:**  

* Know how to create PR and solve merge conflict.
* Can create CI/CD pipeline in either Github Action or Azure DevOps using best practice


**Docker:**  

* Deep understanding with Docker


**DBT:**  

* Deep Knowledge in DBT, preferably with GCP


**SQL:**  

* Deep knowledge of SQL
* Deep understanding with Data modeling, system design


**Soft skills:**  

* Can do attitude, always try to solve sth alone first
* Problem solving, even if there is sth new that you don't know. You have a proper way to solve it. For example, knowing how to Google is always good.
* Communication skills with Stakeholders and tech ppl.
* Love code review and feedback

title: System Architect
description:
Vi utökar nu vår IT-avdelning och söker därför dig, vår nya System Architect, som gillar en händelserik och utvecklande vardag och vill vara en del av vårt engagerade team.


Vad erbjuder vi dig?


Vi välkomnar dig som har viljan och glöden, får saker att hända och kan utmana. Vi är stolta över de resultat vi uppnått men är måna om att utvecklas, är öppna för nya sätt att se på saker och vill alltid bli lite bättre - varje dag. Vi är små nog att fatta snabba beslut som krävs för att hitta nya vägar och nå resultat. Vi tror på kraften att göra förändringar tillsammans och hos oss har du möjlighet att göra skillnad.


Hos oss blir du en del av den viktiga svenska livsmedelsförsörjningen. Att leverera färskt bröd till landets butiker varje dag innebär en fartfylld och varierad vardag oavsett vad du arbetar med här på Pågen. Dagligen ställs vi inför nya utmaningar som vi löser tillsammans.


Vi har bakat bröd sedan 1878, men resan har bara börjat. Nu tar vi steget in i framtiden för att bli Europas modernaste bageri. Och vi vill ha dig med på resan!


Om arbetet


Vill du vara med och forma framtiden för system-mijön på ett av Sveriges mest välkända varumärken?


Pågen fortsätter att växa, och vi söker nu en System Architect. Du erbjuds en kvalificerad och utvecklande tjänst där du jobbar nära vår affär med våra verksamhetsstödjande system.


Tillsammans med övriga System Architects jobbar du för, och fattar beslut som leder till att vi utvecklar och förbättrar våra system.


Vi erbjuder en Microsoft-intensiv miljö där du blir en central kraft i vårt team.


Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter är:

* Säkerställa att Pågen har ett relevant systemstöd och driva utveckling av dessa i nära samarbete med verksamheten.
* Taktiskt och operativt ansvara för framför allt Pågens olika säljstödssystem.
* Stödja verksamheten i processfrågor kopplat till system- och applikationer.
* Driva och delta i förvaltningsgrupper, tillsammans med intressenter från verksamheten. Genom detta arbete koordinera utvecklings-, förbättrings- och förändringsarbete.
* Säkerställa att de systemtekniska lösningarna inom området lever upp till Pågens krav på IT-miljöer och systemförvaltning.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad inom ny teknik, i syfte att utveckla Pågens processer.
* Bedriva egen systemutveckling i syfte att utvärdera, testa eller förbättra lösningar, i mindre omfattning.


Vem är du?


Vi söker dig som har god förståelse för en komplex IT-miljö. Du förstår kopplingen teknik-affär och ser till att våra system och affärsmål samverkar.


Du har tidigare erfarenhet av verksamhetsnära utveckling och implementering av systemstöd, och har redan förflyttat dig eller vill förflytta dig mot arkitekturhållet. Vi ser att du har erfarenhet av webbutveckling i Microsoftmiljö och förståelse för DevOps, samt intresse för integration. Genom din erfarenhet driver du förändring, du kan självständigt designa lösningar utifrån ställda krav och har god förståelse för hur IT drivs ur ett verksamhetsmässigt perspektiv.


Vi ser gärna tidigare erfarenhet av att agera beställare mot leverantörer av IT-tjänster och system.


För att lyckas i rollen är du duktig på att kommunicera och kan agera brygga mellan teknik och process, och mellan IT och övrig verksamhet.


Vidare tror vi att du trivs i att vara med och driva förändring, att tänka och prova nytt med ett praktiskt och jordnära förhållningssätt.


Du bli en del av en grupp som präglas av en öppen och stödjande atmosfär där vi alla hjälps åt med att säkerställa att våra aktiviteter leder till de gemensamma målen.


Sök tjänsten


Vill du vara med på vår resa? idag och bli en del av ett engagerat team där dina idéer och din kompetens gör skillnad!


I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med Cabeza AB, för frågor om tjänsten kontakta rekryteringskonsult Malin Schultz: malin.schultz@cabeza.se.


Vi hanterar ningar löpande, så hör gärna av dig redan idag. Vi ser fram emot din an!

  

På Pågen bakar vi med kärlek det handlar om att ha en omsorg om råvaror och produkter, medarbetare, konsumenter och om våra gemensamma resurser. Pågen är ett familjeföretag i femte generationen och är Sveriges ledande bageri med produkter inom förpackat färskt bröd, jäst kaffebröd, skorpor samt korv- och hamburgerbröd. Med två bagerier där duktiga bagare bakar dag som natt och med medarbetare över hela landet, kan Pågen varje dag förse landets butiker och konsumenter med färskt bröd. Mer information hittar du på www.pagen.se

title: AI Engineer
description:
Sweden / Apply before February 28, 2025
**We are looking for an AI Engineer interested in software quality assurance.**  

At System Verification, we’re not just passionate about quality assurance – we live it. As a leader in QA innovation, we’re seeking an AI Engineer who’s eager to explore the exciting intersection of AI and software quality. If you thrive on pushing boundaries, creating impactful solutions, and collaborating with a team that values quality in every aspect of life, this is the role for you.



Join us in revolutionizing the way testing is done and making a real difference for our clients and their digital lives!



### **What you will do**



You will work with our AI Innovation team to develop methods, tools, and framework to automate test authoring using AI. Your tasks will include utilizing prompt engineering, RAG, and agentic workflows to improve generated tests for a wide range of clients and projects. They will also develop supporting tools and infrastructure to run test generation (with AI) as a service (TaaS). You will work in part in-house and part directly with clients as a consultant.



This position offers a unique opportunity to innovate at the intersection of AI and quality assurance while working on exciting projects with leading-edge technologies.



This position requires occasional travel depending on project and business demands.


### **Requirements**


* BSc or MSc in Computer Science (or other relevant field)
* Proven experience with development in Python
* Experience with automated testing (unit testing, integration testing, system testing, etc.)
* Experience with developing LLM agents for code (LangChain, CrewAI, etc.)
* Experience with prompt engineering
* Experience with Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)

### **Bonus**


* Experience with OpenAI/Anthropic
* Experience with Azure ML and other Azure Cloud services
* Experience with Azure DevOps
* Experience with Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, C#
* Experience with web development
* Proficiency in Swedish, both spoken and written, is an advantage.
### **About us**



A passion for quality assurance, an entrepreneurial spirit, and a big heart for one another – this is a great way to describe who we are and what truly matters to us at System Verification. It’s also why so many of our employees have stayed with us for over 10 years. Quality is in our DNA; it’s what we do and what we, as a company, bring to the market – it’s how we improve the digital lives of our customers. It’s a mindset and a drive to constantly evolve, adapt, and explore new ways to achieve even better results and experiences. However, quality is needed and important in every aspect of life.



Life’s puzzle is often a daily challenge, and our goal is to be the employer that fits you, wherever you are in life and career. We want you to be able to prioritize what gives you energy and motivation, and together, create a work-life balance that suits you.



With us, you’ll enjoy secure employment with extensive opportunities to grow your professional career alongside Northern Europe’s largest network of QA specialists. But you’ll also have a lot of fun along the way and time for your other passions beyond QA!


### **Application**



Selection is ongoing, so don’t wait to apply. Take the step towards an exciting career with us and send in your application today! We’ll be waiting…

title: Engineering Manager, Linköping
description:
Job Title
Engineering Manager, Linköping
Job Description
Introduction*Are you ready for an exciting next step in your career?**We are looking for an experienced Software Manager to lead one or more of our software development teams working to create state-of-the-art surveillance and security solutions.**The Axis site in Linköping is growing at a fast pace and we need to strengthen our management team to help shape the future for our site and our business.*
Who is your future team?
You will be leading a group of 10-20 software engineers divided into development teams working in an agile DevOps model. The group will be a mix of engineers already recruited and engineers that you are expected to recruit and onboard yourself.
You will also be a vital part of the leadership team in Linköping sharing responsibility for the strategic and operational execution of Axis Linköping.
What you will do here as Engineering Manager:
You will be responsible for leading and developing teams working with software components in Axis’ security solutions. As a Software Manager, you will for instance:* Nurture a culture of openness, trust, freedom, responsibility, quality and pride in what we do and how we act
* Together with the team, be responsible for your software components from cradle to grave
* Constantly grow and develop your teams with competence and capability, always ensuring possibility for people to develop their skills, experiences, and careers
* Coach your teams on their journey toward being a high-performing, autonomous DevOps team
* Be working with product managers and other internal and external stakeholders on priorities, expectations, and requirements. As many of the stakeholders are located in Lund, you are expected to travel there from time to time.
* Engage with the local leadership team to set and execute on the strategic direction of the site and its employees


Who are we looking for/Who are you?
You are transparent, confident, energizing, and communicative. You have solid experience with leading and coaching teams and your skill set in this area is proven strong. You take initiatives and drive things to the finish line. You are used to working in a leadership team with a strategic agenda.
Required skills and experience* Knowledgeable and passionate about software development
* Experience in working with agile methodologies, including DevOps
* Experience in leading, coaching and mentoring people
* A “glass-half-full” individual who brings positive energy to a team
* Proficient in both Swedish and English


Bonus points for* Experience in consumer-facing software products/services development
* Experience in driving change within an organization


What Axis has to offer
At Axis in Linköping we work according to methods and principles established in software development in recent years, such as Lean, DevOps and agile variants. This involves constant learning and searching for ways to improve how we work. You will be part of a team with curious and skilled colleagues in a friendly environment. The office is situated in a newly built building in the midst of Ebbepark, where we have the space and prerequisites to continue growing.
Axis is a company that realizes the benefits of a diverse workforce. We know that diversity in groups creates a better working environment and promotes creativity, something that is fundamental for our success.
Ready to Act?
Find out more from our recruiting Director Henrik Kurelid at +46 (0)73-261 52 70 or HR-generalist Hannah Skog, +46 (0)76-176 24 94
Apply today – we evaluate applications continuously.
Type of Employment
Permanent Employment
Posting End Date
2024-12-20*Certain roles at Axis require background checks, which means applicable verifications will be done in these recruitments.* *Notice will be provided before we take any action.*
About Axis Communications
We enable a smarter, safer world by creating innovative solutions for improving security and business performance. As a network technology company and industry leader, we offer solutions in video surveillance, access control, intercom, and audio systems, enhanced by intelligent analytics applications.
With around 4500 committed employees in over 50 countries, we collaborate with partners worldwide. Together, we thrive in our friendly, open, and collaborative culture and inspire each other to think beyond the expected. United by our commitment to inclusion, diversity, and sustainability, we consistently seek to develop our skills and way of working.
Let´s create a smarter, safer world
For more information about Axis, please visit our website www.axis.com.
Listen to Get To Know Axis – Podcast
company_description: Axis Communications is a global growth company with currently are about 4000 employees worldwide and offices in over 50 countries. We are expanding. Visit our webb page axis.com

title: Azure Architect
description:
**Job Description**

We are seeking an experienced Azure Architect. As an Azure Architect, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and optimize Azure solutions on the Microsoft Azure platform specifically tailored to Dynamics 365 applications. You will work closely with our development, operations, and security teams to create scalable, highly available, and secure architectures.

The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of Azure services, strong architecture design skills, and a track record of successful Azure projects. Work closely together with the solution architects/Leads in the Dynamics 365 F&O CoE team to make sure we create global solution as per guardrails.

**Responsibilities and skills:**

* Design and implement scalable and highly available solutions on the Microsoft Azure platform.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define architectural requirements and develop solutions that align with business goals.
* Create and maintain Azure architecture documentation, diagrams, and best practices.
* Provide expertise in areas such as Azure Virtual Machines, Azure App Services, Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, Azure Networking, and Azure Active Directory.
* Ensure compliance with security and governance policies while architecting solutions.
* Develop and implement cost optimization strategies for Azure resources.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex issues related to Azure infrastructure and services.
* Stay updated with the latest Azure features, services, and industry best practices.
* Microsoft Azure certifications, such as Azure Solutions Architect Expert or Azure DevOps Engineer Expert.
* Proven experience designing and implementing Azure solutions.
* Strong knowledge of Azure services and features.
* Familiarity with infrastructure as code (IaC) tools like Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates.
* Proficiency in scripting and automation using tools such as PowerShell or Azure CLI.
* Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
* Experience with DevOps and CI/CD pipelines in Azure.
* Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.

Job Type: Contract  
Contract length: 6 months

Pay: Up to 650,00kr per day

Experience:

* Core Infra: 3 years (Required)
* Azure Services: 5 years (Required)
* Certified Azure Solution Architect: 3 years (Required)

Work Location: In person

title: DevOps engineer
description:
Mpya Sci & Tech är skapat av och för människor som älskar teknik och naturvetenskap. Vi är inte här för att göra något som alla andra gör. Vi tar nischad rekrytering och konsulting till en ny nivå med fokus på kandidatperspektivet. Det är därför vi kallar oss Talent Advisors. Vi tror att de riktiga talangerna är de individer som vågar utvecklas genom hela livet. Med lång erfarenhet och djup kunskap om branschen har vi skapat ett framåtlutat och spetsigt bolag, på vårt sätt.
  
  

På Mpya Sci & Tech tror vi på ett hållbart arbetsliv där vi tillsammans bygger en kultur med genuin delaktighet, ivrig nyfikenhet och möjlighet att få vara sig själv. Kom och utvecklas ihop med oss i Göteborg och Stockholm. Hos en arbetsgivare i världsklass
  
  

To our Data and Software engineering team we are now looking for a skilled DevOps engineer. If you have an interest in Security that is a big +. So, all you, DevSecOps engineers, are most welcome to apply!
  
In our unit we are currently 17 colleagues working within the Data and Software Engineering field on client assignments across diverse industries in the Gothenburg area.
  
  

As an Mployee at Mpya Sci & Tech you are always seen and heard. We are well on our way of being a company where you will thrive together with competent colleagues at interesting assignments and having fun at our homey-feeling office, together with competent and friendly Mpya-colleagues.
  
  

We are looking for you who have a strong background in DevOps practices, automation, and a passion for improving software development workflows. We also think you are a proactive problem solver, well-versed in Git, CI/CD, Docker, and Kubernetes.
  
  

**We believe you have:**  

* Bsc in Computer Science or relevant education
* Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer with a focus on building CI/CD pipelines
* Proficiency Python
* Experience with in Azure cloud, Ansible, Terraform
* Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
* Effective communication and collaboration skills for cross-functional teamwork.
* Fluent in English


**Meritorious if you:**  

* Have experience with Prometheus, Grafana, Typescript, ReactJS, Docker
* Fluent in Swedish


What's in it for you?
  
A great opportunity to develop yourself and contribute with your personality and expertise to a growing company. We are devoted to ensuring you reach your career goals through new and interesting assignments. We have a wide range of clients, within automotive, medtech, bioprinting, telecommunications and much more. We offer competitive and flexible employment where you set the framework for what is important for you and your life situation.
  
  

If you are looking for an employer characterized by a strong culture and with favorable conditions for you as a consultant, you have found the right place!
  
  

If you have questions or want to know more, reach to Talent Advisor, Cecilia Karlsson, 076 164 89 00 or cecilia.karlsson@mpyascitech.com
  
  

Apply at www.mpyascitech.com

title: Platform Engineer
description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 5+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
  
For our client, we are looking for a Platform Engineer.\*\*Software development that makes a difference\*\*Our client is making bold digital visions come true. They aim to lead in the automotive world by creating a digital ecosystem focused on simplifying customers' lives. Now, the client is seeking curious, creative individuals who want to change the world through innovative thinking.\*\*What’s in it for you?\*\* The client is on an ambitious journey to redefine the customer experience in automotive through digital technology. Electrification, Autonomous Drive, and Shared Mobility are enablers for their purpose – providing freedom to move in a personal, sustainable, and safe way. Software engineering is becoming increasingly important in the automotive industry. The client is bringing more software development in-house to better manage continuous integration and the complex interactions between various functions. Their data vision powers innovation and guides every decision with trusted data, overcoming obstacles through innovative, robust designs and design for change.This unit within Software Engineering has a clear purpose: to make consumers feel special and rewarded by delivering leading Scandinavian design and seamless connectivity. They operate in a fun, fast-paced organization, and you can now join the department. The mission is to provide trusted data and insights to understand product and process performance as well as customer behavior, enabling improved efficiency and a better customer experience.They are growing and are therefore looking for curious, creative individuals who want to change the world through innovative thinking. They are seeking a Senior Platform Engineer within Data and Analytics.This team works to accelerate and streamline the use of data, analytics, and AI. They innovate and collaborate to offer a great user experience and to provide a unified self-service platform.\*\*What will you do?\*\* As a Platform Engineer, you will be at the forefront of designing and building a platform to enhance the data and analytics capabilities of the client's Engineering organization. Your responsibilities will include configuring and setting up cloud infrastructure, deploying and operating data-oriented applications on Kubernetes, and collaborating with other teams and platform users to gather requirements and maintain seamless operations.This is an early development phase, giving you the unique opportunity to contribute directly to the platform's foundation. Your input will shape its trajectory, setting the stage for future growth and success.\*\*Some of the tech they use today: \*\* - \*\*Languages: \*\* Python, Go - \*\*Cloud infrastructure: \*\* Azure, Kubernetes - \*\*DevOps: \*\* Terraform, Crossplane, GitHub Actions, Flux, Helm, Prometheus, Grafana, Vault - \*\*PaaS: \*\* Databricks, Snowflake \*\*Who are you?\*\* The client is looking for a proactive individual with a solution-oriented mindset, who is proficient in the following areas: - Public cloud infrastructure (Azure, AWS, or equivalent).- Implementation of scalable infrastructure through an Infrastructure as Code (IaC) approach.- CI/CD with tools such as GitHub Actions, ArgoCD, etc.- Deployment and operation of applications and services on Kubernetes.- Design and implementation of internal developer platforms.Additionally, experience in any of the following is highly valued: - Networking, security, and reliability in enterprise cloud solutions.- Tools and technologies for working with Big Data, including event streaming (e.g., Kafka, MQTT), large-scale data processing (e.g., Apache Spark, Ray), and storage solutions for Big Data (e.g., Apache Iceberg, Delta Lake).- User and device authentication, data and resource access control, and data privacy protection.The client expects you to have a minimum of 5 years of experience in related fields, familiarity with Agile methods, and fluency in English, both verbal and written. You are a proactive problem solver and a flexible team player. This role is based in Gothenburg, Sweden, and the client has an office-first culture, so you will be expected to work the majority of the time from the office in Torslanda, Gothenburg.
  
  

Ansökan Tror du att du är Techster Solutions nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
  
Arbetsplats och kulturVi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
  
Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Lead Architect Microsoft AI Services till itm8
description:
Itm8 är ett nordeuropeiskt powerhouse inom IT och digital transformation, med fokus på Modern Work, AI, systemutveckling, data & BI och verksamhetsrådgivning. Nu söker vi dig som vill arbeta i framkant av digitaliseringens nästa våg. Som Lead Architect inom Microsoft AI Services får du en nyckelroll i att skapa och säkra tekniska lösningar för framtiden.
  
Din roll i vårt team
  
Som Lead Architect hos oss arbetar du både strategiskt och operativt för att skapa och säkra tekniska lösningar inom AI-området. Rollen innebär ansvar för val av teknik, kvalitetssäkring och metodik för leveranser inom området. Du kommer att agera Trusted Advisor åt våra kunder, med fokus på Microsoft Copilot och Azure AI Services, och vägleda dem genom hela projektlivscykeln – från idé till implementering och uppföljning.
  
  

**I ditt uppdrag ingår att:**  

Definiera arkitektur och design för kundlösningar inom Microsoft AI-ekosystemet.
  
Coacha och leda andra konsulter och utvecklare i teamet och sprida bästa praxis.
  
Delta i kundmöten och utveckla affären, inklusive att ge estimat och skapa planer för komplexa uppdrag.
  
Vara aktiv i konsultprojekt och leveranser samt driva kunskapsspridning inom organisationen.
  
Hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste trenderna inom AI och Microsofts teknologier och utvärdera hur dessa kan användas i våra lösningar.
  
  

Vad som gör denna roll unik
  
I denna roll får du möjlighet att vara en ledande röst inom AI och Modern Work, med frihet att utveckla och utforma våra erbjudanden i linje med teknikutvecklingen. Itm8 har en stor och etablerad kundbas som står inför en spännande digital transformationsresa, vilket innebär att du får arbeta med projekt där AI och Modern Work är i fokus och vara en viktig rådgivare för våra kunder.
  
Som Lead Architect kommer du att ha ett brett samarbete med olika kompetensområden, vilket ger dig insikt och utveckling tillsammans med specialister inom management, data science, Microsoft365 och andra affärsområden. Rollen är perfekt för dig som vill arbeta med den senaste tekniken, driva förändring och hjälpa kunderna att ta ett helhetsgrepp på sin digitalisering.
  
  

Dina kompetenser och erfarenheter
  
  

**För att lyckas i denna roll ser vi att du har:**  

Gedigen erfarenhet av att designa och implementera lösningar baserade på Microsoft-teknologier, särskilt inom Cloud, Microsoft 365 och Azure.
  
En djup teknisk förståelse inom AI, inklusive Microsoft Copilot, Azure AI Services och Power Platform.
  
Erfarenhet av molnarkitektur, DevOps, designmönster och säkerhetslösningar.
  
Förmåga att driva affärsutveckling, arbeta som rådgivare och leda både kunder och kollegor.
  
Flytande svenska och engelska, samt vana att presentera och hålla seminarier.
  
  

Vi ser det som ett extra plus om du även har erfarenhet av Data Governance och informationssäkerhet, tekniska färdigheter inom Microsoft Purview och kunskaper i programmeringsspråk som Python, R eller Java.
  
  

Investera i din vardag och framtid
  
Vi erbjuder ett generöst friskvårdsbidrag, möjlighet till personalbil, flexibla arbetstider och betald förskottssemester första året. Dessutom har vi en pensionsavsättning enligt ITP1 och omfattande möjligheter till kompetensutveckling genom både interna och externa utbildningar. På kontoret bjuder vi på frukost och frukt, och regelbundet arrangerar vi sociala aktiviteter som after works och teambuilding för att stärka gemenskapen.
  
  

Är du redo för nästa steg?
  
Är du redo att axla en roll där du får påverka framtiden för både våra kunder och itm8? Här får du en utvecklande roll med stor frihet att forma tekniska lösningar och driva projekt inom AI och Modern Work. Skicka in din ansökan redan idag – vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och uppmuntrar dig därför att söka snarast möjligt. Sista ansökningsdag är 6 december 2024. Vid frågor om rollen är du välkommen att kontakta Mikael Roos på miroo@itm8.com.
  
På itm8 tror vi att mångfald berikar och driver vår innovation framåt. Vi välkomnar sökanden av alla kön, bakgrunder och erfarenheter. Om du delar vår passion för teknik och kundrelationer ser vi fram emot att möta dig och utforska hur vi kan växa tillsammans!

title: Senior Testledare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

*I samband med din ansökan kan du komma att presenteras för kund/partner som en del av rekryteringsprocessen. Om du blir utvald för uppdraget, kommer du att anställas av oss och arbeta antingen hos kund eller i interna projekt och åtaganden som en del av vår konsultverksamhet.*

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**

* minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet i rollen som testledare för förvaltnings- eller utvecklingsuppdrag inom IT inom de senaste 10 åren.
* minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att utföra manuella tester av IT-system inom de senaste 10 åren
* minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att planera och leda tester av IT-leveranser från externa leverantörer inom de senaste 10 åren
* minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att använda adekvat digitalt verktyg som stöd för testledning och tester inom de senaste 10 åren.
* mycket god förmåga att samarbeta med interna och externa intressenter (kommer att verifieras under eventuell konsultintervju).
* god förmåga att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift på svenska eller engelska (kommer att verifieras under eventuell konsultintervju)

**Meriterande*** minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av testledning eller operativ testning av system för budgetering i Ekonomi-domänen inom de senaste 10 åren.
* minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av testledning eller operativ testning av IT system på högskolor/universitet inom de senaste 10 åren
* minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av tester av integrationer inom de senaste 10 åren.
* minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av kravledning eller kravanalys inom de senaste 10 åren.
* minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling av automatiska tester inom de senaste 10 åren.

 **Sista ansökningdatum:** 04-12-2024 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, AI, Machine Learning, Test, Cloud, Infra DevOps, , IT-Projektledning.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Senior testare
description:
Vi söker en senior testare till uppdrag i Malmö.

  

Tjänsten är på heltid, och uppdragsgivaren tillämpar hybrid arbetsmodell med förväntning på 2-3 dagar i veckan på kontoret.


Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.

**Uppdraget**

**Bakgrund:**  

Uppdragsgivaren söker positiva lagspelare som brinner för att skapa värde och som gillar att ta ledning från ett tekniskt perspektiv. Du är bekväm med att delta i kvalitetssäkring och relaterade områden, inklusive moderna integrationsprinciper och metoder.


De tror att du är en person som kan arbeta i osäkerhet och trivs i en snabbföränderlig miljö. Du har en dokumenterad förmåga att skapa struktur i en komplex miljö, du känner dig trygg med att fatta beslut och inspirerar andra att följa ditt ledarskap samtidigt som du tillämpar goda arbetssätt.


Du kan arbeta målinriktat och omvandla strategier till operativa åtgärder som får saker att hända i organisationen. Din nyfikenhet hjälper dig att aktivt tillägna dig ny kunskap och nya färdigheter, och använda dem för att förespråka nya metoder och processer för att förbättra hur saker görs och levereras.

**Omfattningen av konsultuppdraget är att bistå uppdragsgivaren med:**


Stöd i olika testaktiviteter, exempelvis verifiera att acceptanskriterier är testbara och otvetydiga, designa testfall/scenarier, utföra tester, skapa och underhålla regressions-testsviter samt rapportera defekter för att säkerställa kvaliteten på deras nya D365 Finance and Operation-plattform. Arbetet fokuserar på att automatisera regressions-testsviter.

**De huvudsakliga uppgifterna i uppdraget är följande:**  

För att ytterligare förbättra den tekniska grunden för deras digitala kärnerbjudande inom detaljhandel utvecklar de D365 Finance and Operations-plattformen som kommer att tillgodose behoven för flera affärsområden. För att säkerställa en stabil plattform strävar de efter att automatisera tester för olika scenarier.

  

Du kommer att arbeta med produkt- och plattformsteamen för att förstå deras behov och krav och översätta detta till relevanta testfall samt integrera dem i olika miljöer för att säkerställa kvaliteten. De förväntar sig att du är en del av teamen och guidar dem i vad som är möjligt och genomförbart att automatisera och vad som måste testas manuellt för att uppnå en optimal kombination och variation av testning

 **Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**

* Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations


* Verktyg för testautomation


* Testdesigntekniker


* Förmåga att skriva testfall och testscripts


* Förmåga att estimera, designa, utveckla och utföra testfall


* Säkerställa att acceptanskriterier är testbara och otvetydiga


* Azure DevOps


* Erfarenhet av andra Azure-tjänster


* Erfarenhet av andra liknande verktyg och teknologier är också av intresse

 **Om oss**


Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.


Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.


Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.


För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.


Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.

**Vänligen skicka ditt CV på svenska.**

Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

 **Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

GCP requirements:


* Familiar with BigQuery, can code SQL
* Familiar with Cloud composer / airflow
* Familiar with IAM, service account
* Familiar with Data catalog
* Understand Infrastructure as Code
* Good to have knowledge with Dataflow, K8s, Vertex AI pipeline, Kubeflow pipeline


Cloud agnostic skills:


* Python: Deep knowledge about python programing, practice OOP, following coding best practice, know how to use flake8, mypy, black, SonarQube and pre-commit
* Deep knowledge in unit test and end to end test, familiar with Pytest, fixtures, unittest etc


Unix:


* Familiar with popular Unix system, know how to install sth in docker.
* Familiar with shell


Git


* Know how to create PR and solve merge conflict.
* Can create CI/CD pipeline in either Github Action or Azure DevOps using best practice


Deep understanding with Docker


Deep Knowledge in DBT, preferably with GCP


Deep knowledge of SQL


Deep understanding with Data modeling, system design

  

  

**Application deadline:** 28-11-2024  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:

For more information, please contact Kanika Singhal at kanika@incluso.se, recruiter at Incluso.

title: Tech Lead med AI-erfarenhet sökes till Knowit!
description:
Som Tech Lead hos Knowit får du möjligheten att arbeta med innovativa projekt inom både privata och offentliga organisationer. Du kommer att spela en viktig roll i att hjälpa våra kunder utveckla sina AI-baserade system och lösningar, samt bidra till att stärka vår organisations kompetens inom det växande AI-området. Du kommer att bli en viktig del av vårt befintliga AI-nätverk, där engagerade kollegor med passion för området samverkar. Tillsammans skapar vi en individuell utvecklingsplan som matchar dina intressen och mål för din fortsatta karriärutveckling inom AI.

**Vem är du?**


Vi söker dig som har haft rollen som Tech Lead eller likande med praktisk erfarenhet av AI-utveckling.


Du har erfarenhet av att stötta teammedlemmar. Du har varit med och gett råd till beslut som påverkar arkitektur. Du drivs av att omvandla kundens behov till hållbara lösningar. Med andra ord du är en teamplayer!

  

Du har arbetserfarenhet inom **några** av dessa områden:

* Python
* LLM, Large Language Models
* Docker
* REST
* DevOps
* Generativa AI verktyg


Meriterande:

  

* AWS
* Azure AI
* Microsoft Azure
* SQL
* CI/CD

Som person är du positiv, nyfiken på ny teknik, och trivs med att samarbeta i ett team av likasinnade. Det är ett krav att du har relevant högskole- eller universitetsutbildning, alternativt yrkeshögskola kombinerat med praktisk erfarenhet. Du behärskar svenska i både tal och skrift.

**Vi erbjuder**

Hos Knowit får du en trygg och utvecklande arbetsplats där dina kollegor stöttar och inspirerar dig. Du har möjlighet att arbeta med välkända kunder i alla branscher, både inom privat och offentlig sektor. Vi värdesätter jämställdhet och mångfald, och arbetar aktivt för att främja detta i vår rekrytering och i ledarskapet.


Utöver förmåner och attraktiva villkor, vittnar våra medarbetare om att den bästa delen med att arbeta på Knowit är kollegorna och företagskulturen. Vi ordnar regelbundet aktiviteter utanför arbetstid, både inom friskvård och olika sociala evenemang.


Låter detta som en spännande möjlighet för dig? Tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade team på Knowit!


Har du frågor om Knowit eller rollen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Olise Östmark, ansvarig rekryterare: Olise.ostmark@knowit.se


– vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Tech Lead
description:
We are looking for a Tech Lead to join us at NoA Ignite!
   

  

 Here you'll have the opportunity to work with the most interesting minds in the industry on challenging projects with bold customers like Klättermusen, Svenskt Tenn and Our Legacy. We leverage emotion, design, and an up-to-date tech stack to shape the future of commerce.
   

  

 NoA Ignite is a place for visionaries, unconventional minds, experienced experts, and change-makers. A place for people that want to fight digital boredom by creating fun, groundbreaking, and ever-changing digital experiences.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As Tech Lead at NoA Ignite, you will be functioning as both a hands-on developer and a driving force behind our technical vision. You’ll play a central role in shaping and improving our internal tools, processes, and practices. We’re looking for someone who is not only highly skilled but also curious and willing to explore new approaches, pushing our development forward. With your analytical skills, you’ll be able to assess frameworks and solutions both technically and from a client cost perspective.
   

  

**We Think You Bring**
* Deep experience in Typescript and Next.js, as well as proficiency in React.
* Significant experience working on e-commerce projects, ideally within complex, high-performance environments.
* A strong interest in testing and DevOps, with a passion for enhancing quality assurance practices.
* Familiarity with Node.js and Express.
* Experience in hosting, performance optimization, and caching, with a clear understanding of their impact on final products.
* Knowledge of CMS solutions and how to integrate and optimize them for various projects.
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP for hosting, scaling, and monitoring applications.


**It’s a Bonus Of You Have**
* Basic understanding of containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes).
* Experience with React Native.


**Your Responsibilities**
* Play a key role in the team by contributing to the refinement and development of our internal processes and practices.
* Act as a key influencer in evaluating and implementing new frameworks and technologies.
* Work closely with project managers and business developers to deliver cost-effective, top-tier solutions to our clients.
* Ensure high-quality deliveries by staying up-to-date on trends and best practices in areas like performance, hosting, and caching.


**Why join NoA Ignite?**
 At NoA Ignite, we aim to gather the most interesting minds in the industry to shape the future of digital platforms.
   

  

* Technically Brave: With our expertise and playful approach to technology, design, and emotion, we create the digital experiences of tomorrow.
* Authentic Agency in a Strong Network: Here, your ideas matter. Being part of the NoA network gives us access to experts in any field to realize them.
* Top Industry Talent and Bold Clients: Work with the best people and the most interesting minds – colleagues and clients alike.
* A Place for Development: We value working with customers, colleagues, and projects that ignite sparks and foster growth.


**Our Recruitment Process**
 There is no need for a personal letter or CV/resumé; provide us with the link to your LinkedIn profile and your GitHub or private portfolio and answer a few initial questions – that's it!

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
**What You Will Do**
 Are you passionate about automation, scalability, and making complex systems run smoothly? At Velory, we're looking for a talented DevOps Engineer to join our team as we scale our B2B SaaS platform to new heights. In this role, you’ll play a critical part in designing, implementing, and optimizing our infrastructure to support our growing user base.
   

  

 As a DevOps Engineer at Velory, you’ll work closely with our development teams to ensure our platform is highly available, secure, and able to handle the challenges of a rapidly expanding business.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Build, maintain, and scale our AWS-based cloud infrastructure to support the growth of our platform.
* Develop and implement CI/CD pipelines to streamline development and deployment processes.
* Monitor system performance and ensure high availability and reliability.
* Collaborate with developers to improve system architecture and resolve operational challenges.
* Utilize Kubernetes for container orchestration and Docker for containerization.
* Implement security best practices across the infrastructure.
* Leverage infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform to maintain consistent and reproducible environments.
* Manage and optimize cloud costs while maintaining performance.
* Contribute to staying cloud-agnostic by designing infrastructure solutions that allow future customers to host our services on-premises.
* Ensure robust backup strategies are in place to protect critical data.


**Who You Are**
* You have experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and containerization tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
* You are skilled in infrastructure as code (e.g., Terraform, Ansible).
* You have strong knowledge of Linux systems and networking.
* You enjoy automating repetitive tasks using scripting languages like Python, Bash, or similar.
* You are passionate about improving system performance, reliability, and security.
* You are a team player who thrives in a collaborative environment and communicates effectively.
* Bonus: Experience in designing cloud-agnostic solutions or on-premise deployments.
* Bonus: Experience working in a B2B SaaS environment or scaling systems for high user volumes.


 In addition to our ambitious vision and mission, the people and culture here are what most of our team members see as our biggest strengths. To really thrive here you should align well with our core values:
   

  

 👑 Show ownership by looking at the big picture, and taking initiative to dig in where needed to help us succeed. Always acting as Velory Ambassador.
   

  

 ⚡️ Manage speed by getting rid of obstacles to keep a high, sustainable pace.
   

  

 💎 Represent quality by aiming high, sweating the details, and iterating.
   

  

 🤝 Earn trust by being communicative and transparent, and by following through on your commitments.
   

  

 ✨ Deliver wow by going beyond expectations, and doing so in a creative, unexpected way.
   

  

 As a person you are:
   

  

* A visionary leader with a strong sense of ownership and commitment to excellence.
* Proactive in identifying and removing roadblocks, maintaining a high pace of progress.
* Detail-oriented, ensuring quality in every touchpoint with the customer
* Trustworthy and transparent, fostering a culture of trust and mutual respect within and outside the organization.
* Creative and driven, consistently exceeding expectations and delivering exceptional results.


**What We Offer**
* A fast-growing team on an ambitious mission to digitize businesses world-wide
* A diverse team of talented and supportive colleagues
* Freedom and flexibility in how and where you work
* Centrally located office in Stockholm
* Six weeks of paid vacation
* Pension at ITP1 levels
* Generous wellness grant and weekday group training sessions with personal trainer
* Private healthcare insurance
* Use our own Velory Platform to select the hardware you want


 This is Velory
   

  

 Velory enables companies to buy and manage their IT in an automated, secure and circular way.
   

  

* IT Lifecycle Management: streamlining IT workflows from purchase to end of life.
* Employee Empowerment: unleashing productivity from the first day to the last


 Velory is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

title: CloudOps Engineer
description:
**Who We Are Is What We Do.**
 Deel and our family of growing companies are made up of global teams dedicated to helping businesses hire anyone, anywhere, easily.
   

  

 The team comprises over three thousand self-driven individuals spanning over 100 countries, and our unified yet diverse culture keeps us continually learning and innovating the platform and products for customers.
   

  

 Companies should be able to hire the best talent anywhere in the world, so we are building the best platform to make that a reality. Our market-leading technology, expertise, and global team are crucial to the platform’s success. We deliver the best products and features in our space, enabling millions of jobs worldwide and connecting the global workforce with the best companies and opportunities.
   

  

**Why should you be part of our success story?**
 A 30-mile hiring radius should no longer dictate how companies hire because exceptional talent lives everywhere. Deel sees a world without hiring borders and endless talent that pairs perfect candidates with great companies.
   

  

 We offer global teams all the tools they need to hire, onboard, manage, pay, and scale at full speed. We aim to foster a diverse global economy by building a generational platform that seamlessly connects companies with talent worldwide.
   

  

 After our successful Series D in 2021, we raised another $50M in 2023, doubling our valuation to $12B. There’s never been a more exciting time to join Deel — the international payroll and compliance market leader.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Design and manage various monitoring and observability tools to efficiently troubleshoot and resolve production issues.
* Oversee the management of our Active Directory infrastructure and ensure the smooth operation of Windows operating systems supporting internal applications.
* Supervise our AWS deployments (SaaS) operating on AWS EKS.
* Maintain and enhance tools for implementing DevOps principles, including CI/CD automation and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) on our Cloud-based systems.
* Install, configure, update, and troubleshoot our product microservices and tools, including databases.


**Desired Skills and Experience:**
* Over 4 years of professional experience in Infrastructure Operations, with 2+ years of focused DevOps experience.
* Experience with cloud computing technologies, preferably AWS.
* Strong scripting and automation skills such as bash, Python, PowerShell .
* Experience utilizing IaC tools, such as Terraform.
* Familiarity with GitOps and CI/CD methodologies, utilizing tools like ArgoCD, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins.
* Knowledge and hands-on experience with alerting and monitoring tools such as DataDog, Prometheus, and Grafana.
* Results-driven mindset with a strong commitment to task completion.
* Great communication skills.
* Ability to drive projects from inception to implementation.
* A self-motivated individual capable of proactive problem-solving and strategic thinking.
* Comfortable working in a high-scale, rapidly evolving environment.


**Total Rewards**
 Our workforce deserves fair and competitive pay that meets them where they are. With scalable benefits, rewards, and perks, our total rewards programs reflect our commitment to inclusivity and access for all.

* Provided computer equipment tailored to your role

 At Deel, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that values diversity and positively encourage applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of race, religion, sex, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, pregnancy or maternity or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
